hackathon-description-text: The Seattle VR hackathon focuses on the rapidly evolving technology of Virtual Reality and its many relatives - augmented reality, mixed reality, and novel interface technologies like gestures and haptics.

hackathon-judges.judge-role: VR Pioneer/Professor/Founder of Virtual World Society

hackathon-eligibility: Even though it says "hacking" in the name, the hackathon is open to the whole VR community. We welcome developers, artists, industry professionals, researchers, film-makers, psychologists, sound designers, game designers, and general enthusiasts.
hackathon-requirements:
What goals did you and your team have going in to this hackathon?
| What was the inspiration? What does it do? 

(
(
hackathon-rules: Each team member can create a Devpost account and be added to a project.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: We partnered up with Booz Allen Hamilton and the PATH Foundation to create a prize category that focuses on education around malaria, the mosquito-borne disease.

hackathon-description-header: Come hack VR, AR, interfaces, and more!
